src:
Sempat Padam, Listrik di Wilayah Sekitar PGC Jaktim Sudah Normal
02 Nov 2019, 21:30 by Sachril Agustin
Jakarta - Beberapa wilayah di Jakarta sempat mengalami listrik padam. Untuk di sekitar Pusat Grosir Cililitan (PGC), Jakarta Timur, listrik sudah kembali menyala.
Pantauan detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019) sekira pukul 20.32 WIB, listrik di sekitaran PGC telah menyala. Sebelumnya, listrik di wilayah ini padam.
Akibat mati listrik tadi, warga dan pedagang sulit beraktivitas. Terlihat ketika listrik padam, banyak warga yang menyalakan lilin agar mendapat penerangan.
Traffic Light Simpang PGC pun sempat padam. Ketika lampu merah Simpang PGC padam, Jalan Dewi Sartika arah ke Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, terjadi kemacetan panjang. Lalu lintas di persimpangan juga sedikit semrawut.
"Tadi ketika listrik padam, saya sulit beraktivitas," kata tukang servis jam tangan, Doni, ketika ditemui di Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, Jatinegara, Jakarta Timur, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Doni mengungkapkan, listrik padam dari sekitar pukul 20.00 WIB. Dia pun mengaku tidak mengetahui penyebab mati listrik.
"Saya dari arah Halim tadi dan di sana, listrik juga mati," lanjutnya.


Foto: Suasana di sekitar PGC yang listriknya sudah kembali menyala (Sachril/detikcom)

Penjual tas di Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, Muhammad Nasir mengungkapkan, ia sempat khawatir bila listrik tidak kunjung menyala. Sebab, lanjutnya, dagangannya tidak akan laku.
"Kalau tadi mati listriknya lama, enggak bakal ada orang yang lihat dagangan saya. Soalnya kan gelap, enggak bakal kelihatan. Lilin saja tidak cukup untuk penerangan," ujar Nasir.
Terpantau, warga dan pedagang di sekitaran PGC telah beraktivitas seperti biasa. Lilin yang sebelumnya menyala, telah dimatikan.
Traffic Light Simpang PGC yang sebelumnya padam, telah menyala kembali. Lalu lintas di sekitaran PGC, terpantau ramai lancar. Tidak terlihat ada kesemrawutan di sekitaran jalan.

(fdu/fdu)
text:
Had been extinguished, electricity in the area around PGC East Jakarta was normal
02 Nov 2019, 21:30 by Sachril Agustin
Jakarta - Some areas in Jakarta experienced power outages. For around the Cililitan Wholesale Center (PGC), East Jakarta, electricity has re-ignited.
AFP monitoring on Saturday (11/02/2019) at around 20.32 West Indonesia Time, electricity around the PGC has been lit. Previously, electricity in the region went out.
As a result of the power outage, residents and traders find it difficult to move. It can be seen when the electricity goes out, many people light candles to get lighting.
Traffic Light Intersection PGC was briefly extinguished. When the red light at the PGC Intersection goes out, Jalan Dewi Sartika heading to Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, there is a long traffic jam. Traffic at the intersection is also a bit chaotic.
"Earlier when the electricity went out, I found it difficult to move," said the watch repairman, Doni, when met on Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, Jatinegara, East Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019).
Doni revealed, electricity went out from around 20:00 WIB. He also claimed not to know the cause of power failure.
"I'm from the direction of Halim and there, the electricity also went out," he continued.


Photo: The atmosphere around the PGC, the electricity is back on (Sachril / detikcom)

Bag seller on Jalan Raya Jakarta-Bogor, Muhammad Nasir, revealed that he was worried that the electricity would not go on. Because, he continued, the merchandise will not sell.
"If the power had been cut off a long time ago, no one would have seen my merchandise. The problem was that it was dark, it wouldn't be seen. Even candles aren't enough for lighting," Nasir said.
Observed, residents and traders around the PGC have been active as usual. The candle that was previously lit, has been turned off.
Traffic Light The previously extinguished PGC intersection, has been lit again. Traffic around the PGC, was observed to be very busy. There was no visible clutter around the road.

(fdu / fdu)
